subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: David Gilliland won a 300-mile Busch Series race June 17 in Sparta, Ky. He became the first non-Nextel Cup regular to win a Busch Series race this season.
snippet: David Gilliland won a 300-mile Busch Series race June 17 in Sparta, Ky. He became the first non-Nextel Cup regular to win a Busch Series race this season.
